class.name: Phaser.Physics.P2.PointProxy

parameters.name: world
parameters.help: A reference to the P2 World.

class.help: A PointProxy is an internal class that allows for direct getter/setter style property access to Arrays and TypedArrays.

public.name: mx
public.inlineHelp: The x property of this PointProxy get and set in meters.

public.name: my
public.inlineHelp: The x property of this PointProxy get and set in meters.

public.name: x
public.inlineHelp: The x property of this PointProxy get and set in pixels.

public.name: y
public.inlineHelp: The y property of this PointProxy get and set in pixels.
